msg: Changed the JNDI NodeHandler to return an empty list for the attributes

author: berndf
msg: no need to inline xml entity configuration files if you make them available to the XML configuration loader properly. simple but great patch by Zsombor (spring.patch) [JAMES-803]

author: faridz
msg: * include/rw/_mutex.h (__rw_atomic_exchange): New overload for bool type to
avoid using of template overload with mutex to atomically swap two bool's

author: faridz
msg: * tests/localization/22.locale.codecvt.mt.cpp: Use %d format instead of %zu for printing
the number of iterations to avoid printing the incorrect value on LLP64 platforms).
